Text.Value: You should know, I worship the goddess Shar.
Explain that you worship Shar and why you needed to keep it a secret.
I do care that you didn't tell me until now. Yes, we've all had our secrets, but we need to work as a team.
Pray to whomever you like. Just leave me out of it.
*You consider how he's likely to react. The two of you seem to be of the same mind - surely he'd understand.*
I do care that you didn't tell me until now. I thought we were a team.
Oh, that's what you've been tiptoeing around? My dear, I couldn't care less.
*You consider how he's likely to react. The two of you seem to be of the same mind - and if anyone can understand why you'd keep this secret, surely a vampire would.*
Just don't come preaching to me about your Lady of Loss. I've lost plenty already - I'd quite like to keep what I have.
Justify your worship of Shar and the need to keep it secret.
Hells, that's what you've been tiptoeing around? Why would I care who you worship?
*You consider how he's likely to react. You're not friends, but he doesn't seem to hate you either. And can a vampire really blame you for keeping secrets?*
*You consider how he's likely to react. You're not friends, but he doesn't seem to hate you either. It might be worth the risk.*
*You consider how he's likely to react. You haven't seen eye-to-eye on many things so far.*
*You consider how he's likely to react. You haven't seen eye-to-eye on many things, but can a vampire really judge you for keeping secrets?*
I am glad you told me, though. I'm glad you trusted me enough.

Synopsis: SH discusses her being a Shar worshipper
